public static java.lang.String evaluate(java.lang.String equation,

Replaces 'x' in the equation with the supplied value for x. Adds * where implied multiplication should be.

findReplacements

public static double[] findReplacements(char sign,
                                        java.lang.String expression)
Used to replace a single expression (ie, 3 + 4) with the result of the expression (ie, 7). Finds the FIRST occurrence of the supplied sign.

Parameters:
sign - char
expression - String
Returns:
double[] numbers numbers[0] = start of the expression numbers[1] = end of the expression numbers[2] = first number (ie, 3) numbers[3] = second number (ie, 4)

parenthesis

                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Recursive function. Removes parenthesis from an equation and simplifies whatever expression is inside.

eq - String
Returns:
String
Throws:
exception - for invalid/unclosed parenthesis
